long_description: The Osprey Ozone Daypack adds protection and organization for all the necessities of travel. It's the perfect travel companion to the Osprey Ozone wheeled luggage, sold separately. Osprey has channeled years of experience building lightweight packs and luggage into this fresh design. AirScape spacer-mesh padded shoulder straps and back panel provide a comfortable, ventilated carry by reducing heat build-up. Handle-It(TM) attachment flap quickly connects Ozone Daypack to extendable roller handles up to 6 in. wide; its design provides well-balanced carrying. Large front organizer pocket with key clip. Padded sleeve fits and protects laptops to 15 in. and has direct zipper access. Padded sleeve fits most tablet and e-reader devices. Stretch mesh side pockets. Folder/magazine sleeve. Zip pocket holds eyeglasses and other small items. Side compression straps ensure secure carrying no matter what size your load is. While the Ozone daypack is a beautiful complement to the Osprey Ozone wheeled luggage, this sharp, cosmopolitan backpack can certainly be carried on its own. Please note: although not removable, the Handle-It attachment flap lays down flush against the back panel when not in use so you won't even know its there.
short_description: The Osprey Ozone Daypack adds protection and organization for all the necessities of travel. It's the perfect travel companion to the Osprey Ozone wheeled luggage, sold separately.
